slabs.title: Toptan Traverten Plakalar | Majen
slabs.desc: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar, taşın doğal doğrusal damarlarını ortaya çıkararak yüzeylerde çarpıcı ve kesintisiz bir akış sağlar. Hareket ve derinliğin ön planda olduğu duvar kaplamaları, zeminler ve büyük ebatlı tasarımlar için idealdir.
slabs.intro: Majen, Uşak–Ulubey’deki ocağından doğrudan tedarik ettiği Toptan Traverten Plakalar ile 2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm kalınlıklarda slab üretimi yapan öncü bir ihracatçıdır. Blaundos Antiko, Light ve Ivory renklerinde sunulan traverten plakalarımız; tutarlılık, dayanıklılık ve doğal şıklık için özel olarak seçilir. Her plaka, A-sınıfı standartları karşılayacak şekilde dikkatle kesilir, kontrol edilir ve uluslararası sevkiyat için güçlendirilir; dünya genelinde mimarlar ve toptancılar tarafından güvenle tercih edilir.
slabs.title2: Neden Toptan Traverten Plakaları Tercih Etmelisiniz?
slabs.intro2: Türkiye, travertenin dünya çapındaki en büyük tedarikçisidir ve Majen bu pazarda premium seçenekler sunar. Toptan Traverten Plakalarımız; cilalı, honlu, fırçalı ve eskitilmiş yüzey seçenekleriyle farklı projelere uygun çözümler sağlar. Doğrudan ocak tedariki, istikrarlı arz ve rekabetçi fiyatlandırma sunar. İthalatçılar ve tasarımcılar, hem dayanıklılık hem de zamansız estetik gerektiren konut, ticari ve otel projelerinde Majen plakalarına güvenir.

detailsHeadings.title1: Neden Traverten Plakalarımız?

cuts.heading: Traverten Plaka Kesim Seçenekleri
cuts.text: Majen, Traverten Plakalar için iki farklı kesim yöntemi sunar — Vein-Cut ve Cross-Cut. Her seçenek, farklı desen ve ton karakterlerini öne çıkararak çeşitli mimari ihtiyaçlara cevap verir. Sakin ve rafine bir görünüm için honlu, rustik doku için fırçalı veya eskitilmiş, lüks iç mekânlar için cilalı yüzeyleri tercih edebilirsiniz.

detailsHeadings.title1: Neden Vein-Cut Travertenimiz?

description: Uşak–Ulubey’deki ocağımızdan doğrudan temin edilen Majen Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar; belirgin, kesintisiz doğrusal damarlar ve güvenilir renk uyumu sunar. Her blok, el ile seçilir; hassas şekilde kesilir ve ihracat için güçlendirilir; böylece büyük, yönlü tasarımlarda tutarlı A-sınıf kalite ve öngörülebilir sonuçlar elde edilir.

Akış ve ritmin önemli olduğu iç mekânlar için idealdir: otel lobileri, uzun koridorlar, duvar kaplamaları, zeminler, resepsiyon bankoları ve vurgu duvarları. Paralel damar yapısı; mekânsal sürekliliği ve modern estetiği güçlendirir; uyumlu karolar sayesinde odalar arasında kesintisiz geçişler sağlar.

Standart üretim kalınlıkları 2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm’dir. Panel eşleştirmeyi ve damar sürekliliğini kolaylaştıran büyük ebatlı formatlar mevcuttur. Sıkı kalibrasyon ve kalınlık kontrolü, atığı azaltır; montajı hızlandırır ve geniş yüzeylerde görsel bütünlüğü korur.

Mevcut yüzeyler: honlu, cilalı, fırçalı, eskitilmiş; dolgulu veya dolgusuz seçeneklerle. Plakalar, nem korumalı ve köşe koruyuculu güçlendirilmiş ahşap kasalara bağlanarak konteyner yüklemesine ve uzun mesafeli deniz taşımacılığına uygun şekilde paketlenir.

seo.title: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar | Premium Toptan | Majen
seo.description: Türkiye’den doğrudan tedarik edilen premium vein-cut traverten plakalar. Doğrusal damar yapısı, dolgulu veya dolgusuz seçenekler; honlu, cilalı, fırçalı ve eskitilmiş yüzeyler. 2 cm & 3 cm kalınlıklar, özel ebat imkânı ve oçaktan şantiyeye güvenilir ihracat.

vein-cut.title: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar
vein-cut.intro: Majen, Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları Türkiye’deki Uşak–Ulubey ocağından doğrudan tedarik eder. Her plaka, yüzey boyunca zarif doğrusal damarlar sergileyerek iç duvar kaplamaları, zeminler ve büyük ölçekli ticari projeler için rafine bir mimari görünüm sunar. Hassas kesim, tutarlı renklenme ve global FOB/CIF ihracat seçenekleriyle Majen, uluslararası alıcılar için üstün kalite ve zamansız taş estetiği sağlar.
vein-cut.intro2: Vein-Cut Traverten, taşın doğal tabakalarına paralel şekilde kesilerek üretilir; bu sayede kesintisiz doğrusal damarlar ortaya çıkar. Bu teknik, mimari dengede ve mekânsal süreklilikte önemli rol oynayan yönlü bir desen oluşturur. Modern iç mekânlar, cepheler ve ticari zeminler için ideal olan bu plakalar; zarafet ve dayanıklılığı, tutarlı renk ve pürüzsüz yüzey bitişleriyle birleştirir. Majen’in doğrudan ocak tedariki, güvenilir kalite ve sürdürülebilir ihracat standartları sunar.

variants.title: Dolgulu ve Dolgusuz Yüzey Seçenekleri
variants.text: Majen’in Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları, farklı tasarım ihtiyaçlarına uyum sağlayabilmek için dolgulu ve dolgusuz çeşitlerde sunulur. Dolgulu plakalar; lüks iç mekânlar için yoğun, cilalı yüzeyler oluşturmak amacıyla reçine veya çimento ile güçlendirilir. Dolgusuz plakalar, doğal gözenekleri koruyarak rustik ve dış mekân uygulamaları için tercih edilen otantik bir doku sunar. Her plaka sevkiyattan önce titizlikle kontrol edilir, güçlendirilir ve dokümante edilir; böylece uluslararası teslimatlarda sorunsuz sonuçlar elde edilir.

vein-cut.desc: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar, taşın doğal doğrusal damarlarını ortaya çıkararak yüzeylerde çarpıcı ve kesintisiz bir akış oluşturur. Hareket ve derinliğin öne çıktığı duvar kaplamaları, zeminler ve büyük ebatlı tasarımlar için idealdir.

TextSection.text1: Projelerinizin tasarım hedeflerine uygun olarak honlu, cilalı, fırçalı veya eskitilmiş yüzeyler arasından seçim yapabilirsiniz. Honlu yüzeyler, yumuşak mat bir görünüm sağlar; cilalı yüzeyler ışığı yansıtarak lüks bir atmosfer yaratır. Fırçalı ve eskitilmiş yüzeyler ise dokuyu ön plana çıkarır; doğal kaymazlık ve yaşlandırılmış estetik sunar. Tüm yüzey işleme süreçleri, Majen’in ileri teknoloji makineleri ve sıkı yüzey kalibrasyon standartları ile gerçekleştirilir.
TextSection.text2: Vein-Cut Traverten, kesintisiz doğrusal damarlarıyla hareket ve görsel derinliği vurgular. Bu yönlü akış, otel lobileri, uzun koridorlar ve modern mimaride dinamik bir zarafet katar. Estetik avantajların yanı sıra taş; yüksek yapısal bütünlük, tutarlı desen tekrarı ve doğal izolasyon özelliklerine sahiptir. Majen, büyük ölçekli uygulamalarda güvenilir renk ve damar uyumu sağlayabilmek için blokları dikkatle seçer.
TextSection.text3: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar; duvar kaplamaları, zeminler, tezgâhlar ve cephe uygulamalarında, yön hissinin mimari akışı güçlendirdiği projelerde yaygın olarak kullanılır. Doğrusal damar deseni; süreklilik, simetri ve mekânsal uyum vurgulanan tasarımlar için idealdir. Tasarımcılar, hem çağdaş hem de klasik ortamlarda bu plakaları tercih ederek, doğal taş sıcaklığını zamansız bir görsel derinlikle birleştirir.
TextSection.header4: Vein-Cut Traverten İçin Neden Majen?
TextSection.text4: Majen, ocaktan çıkarma aşamasından teslimata kadar tüm süreci doğrudan yöneten bir ocak tedarikçisidir. Her blok; damar yapısının netliği, renk tutarlılığı ve kesim kalitesi açısından seçilir. FOB ve CIF sevkiyat koşulları, tam ihracat dokümantasyonu ve güçlendirilmiş ahşap kasa paketleme ile çalışırız. Uzun vadeli istikrar ve proje odaklı hizmet yaklaşımımız sayesinde, Majen mimarlar, ithalatçılar ve taş distribütörleri tarafından güvenilir bir iş ortağı olarak tercih edilir.
TextSection.text5: Majen, Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları Avrupa, Kuzey Amerika ve Orta Doğu’ya ihraç eder. Her plaka; kalınlık, yüzey bitişi ve dayanım için uluslararası derecelendirme standartlarını karşılar. Etkin lojistik, hızlı dokümantasyon ve tutarlı stok yönetimi ile toptancılar ve proje geliştiricileri için sorunsuz teslimatlar sağlanır. Her sipariş; çeki listeleri, faturalar ve menşe şahadetnamesi ile doğrulanır.

detailsHeadings.title1: Neden Vein-Cut Travertenimiz?

description: Uşak–Ulubey’deki ocağımızdan doğrudan tedarik edilen Majen Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar; net, kesintisiz doğrusal damarlar ve güvenilir renk uyumu sunar. Her blok el ile seçilir, hassas şekilde kesilir ve ihracat için güçlendirilir; böylece büyük, yönlü tasarımlarda tutarlı A-sınıf kalite ve öngörülebilir sonuçlar elde edilir.

Akış ve ritmin önemli olduğu iç mekânlar için idealdir: otel lobileri, uzun koridorlar, duvar kaplamaları, zeminler, resepsiyon bankoları ve vurgu duvarları. Paralel damar yapısı; mekânsal sürekliliği ve modern estetiği güçlendirir; uyumlu karolar, odalar arasında kesintisiz geçişler sağlar.

Standart üretim kalınlıkları 2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm’dir. Panel eşleştirmeyi ve damar sürekliliğini kolaylaştıran büyük ebatlı formatlar mevcuttur. Sıkı kalibrasyon ve kalınlık kontrolü, atığı azaltır; montajı hızlandırır ve geniş yüzeylerde görsel bütünlüğü korur.

Mevcut yüzeyler: honlu, cilalı, fırçalı, eskitilmiş; dolgulu veya dolgusuz seçeneklerle. Plakalar, nem korumalı ve köşe koruyuculu güçlendirilmiş ahşap kasalara bağlanarak konteyner yüklemesine ve uzun mesafeli deniz taşımacılığına uygun şekilde paketlenir.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: Vein-Cut Traverteni Cross-Cut’a göre neden tercih etmeliyim?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Vein-Cut Traverten, kesintisiz paralel damarları ortaya çıkararak dinamik bir hareket ve zarafet sunar. Yön ve akış hissi aranan çağdaş iç mekânlarda idealdir; Cross-Cut ise daha bulutlu, homojen bir desen sağlar.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar için hangi yüzeyler mevcut?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Majen, cilalı, honlu, fırçalı ve eskitilmiş yüzeyleri; hem dolgulu hem de dolgusuz seçeneklerle sunar. Tüm yüzeyler, küresel ihracat kalite standartlarına ve müşteri beklentilerine uygun olarak işlenir.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Bu plakalar dış mekân kullanımı için uygun mu?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Evet. Dolgusuz, fırçalı veya eskitilmiş yüzeyler; dış cepheler ve teraslar için dayanıklılık ve doğal kaymazlık sağlayan ideal seçeneklerdir.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Majen, Vein-Cut plakaları 2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm kalınlıklarda üretir. Özel mimari veya ticari projeler için talebe göre özel ölçüler de planlanabilir.

filled.heading: Dolgulu İşlemler
filled.text: Cilalı ve yoğun yüzeyler için uygun dolgulu seçenekler.

unfilled.heading: Dolgusuz İşlemler
unfilled.text: Doğal görünüm ve belirgin doku isteyen uygulamalar için dolgusu yapılmamış seçenekler.

seo.title: Dolgusuz Doğal Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar – Türkiye’den Ocak Tedarikçisi | Majen
seo.description: Dolgusuz Doğal Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları keşfedin: açık gözenekli yapı, doğal mat doku ve kesintisiz doğrusal damarlar. Ivory, Light ve Antico renkleriyle dünya geneline ihracata hazır.

natural.title: Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar
natural.lead: Majen, Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları Türkiye’deki Uşak–Ulubey ocağından doğrudan tedarik eder. Doğal tabaka yönlerine paralel kesilen plakalar, zarif doğrusal damarların yanı sıra taşın açık gözenekli yapısını ve otantik dokusunu korur. Dolgusuz doğal bitiş; rustik iç mekânlar, spa alanları ve dış mimaride mat, dokunsal ve organik bir görünüm sunar. Dayanıklı, nefes alabilen ve görsel olarak doğal — zamansız tasarımlar için üretilmiştir.
natural.intro: Majen, Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları Türkiye’deki Uşak–Ulubey ocağından doğrudan tedarik eder. Doğal tabaka yönlerine paralel kesilen her plaka, zarif doğrusal damarların devamlılığını korurken taşın açık gözenekli, özgün dokusunu olduğu gibi yansıtır. Bu dolgusu yapılmamış doğal yüzey, travertenin ham güzelliğini ortaya çıkarır; rustik iç mekânlar, spa bölgeleri ve dış mimari için yumuşak mat tonlarla birlikte güçlü bir dokunsal karakter sunar.
natural.intro2: “Vein-Cut”, taşın doğal tabakalarına paralel kesim yapılarak damarların doğrusal yönde açığa çıkarılmasını ifade eder. “Unfilled Natural” yani dolgusu yapılmamış doğal bitiş, gözeneklerin açık bırakıldığı ve yüzeyin ham yapısının korunduğu görünümü tanımlar. Bu finisaj, doğal nefes alabilirliği ve ham estetiği koruyarak özellikle Akdeniz tarzı ve çevre dostu mimaride yüksek değer görür. Majen, büyük projelerde ton ve damar sürekliliğini sağlayabilmek için her bloğu renk uyumu, kalibrasyon hassasiyeti ve gerçek doğal yapı açısından tek tek seçer.

detailsHeadings.title1: Neden Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Plakalarımız?

variants.title: Renk Seçenekleri: Ivory, Light ve Antico
variants.text: Majen, farklı mimari stilleri tamamlamak için Ivory, Light ve Antico tonlarını sunar. Ivory; açık ve aydınlık iç mekânlar için yumuşak krem sıcaklığı sağlar. Light; modern ve minimalist tasarımlar için dengeli, nötr bej ton sunar. Antico ise rustik ve tarihi projelerde doğal kontrast yaratan, daha derin toprak tonlu bir karaktere sahiptir. Tüm renkler, büyük uygulamalarda ton ve damar uyumu yakalamak için aynı ocak katmanlarından seçilir.

description: Doğal damar yönünü takip eden doğrusal çizgiler ve açık bırakılmış gözenekler, dokunsal doku ve organik bir görünüm kazandırır. Sürdürülebilir şekilde temin edilen bu taş; hem rustik hem de çağdaş projelerde dayanıklılık ve doğallığı bir arada sunar.
Ivory, Light ve Antico ton seçenekleriyle sunulur.
2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm kalınlıklarda üretilir. Damar hizalamasını ve uygulamada sürekliliği kolaylaştıran büyük ebatlı plakalar mevcuttur.
Ana yüzey: Doğal (Dolgusuz) mat doku. Dünya geneline ihracata uygun olacak şekilde güçlendirilmiş ahşap kasalarda güvenli biçimde paketlenir.

TextSection.header1: Vein-Cut Plakalarda Dolgusuz Doğal Yüzeyin Avantajları
TextSection.text1: Traverteni dolgusu yapılmadan bırakmak, doğal hava boşluklarını ve organik dokuyu korur. Bu yaklaşım; daha yüksek kaymazlık, belirgin dokunsal derinlik ve malzemenin jeolojik kökenini ifade eden ham bir görünüm sağlar. Dolgusuz yüzeyler özellikle nemli ortamlarda ayak altında daha iyi tutuş sunar. Majen’in hassas kalibrasyonu, taşın otantik karakterinden ödün vermeden kalınlıkta stabilite ve yüzeyde minimum tolerans farkı sağlar.
TextSection.text2: Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Traverten Plakalar; dış teraslar, cepheler, spa alanları, bahçe yürüyüş yolları ve rustik iç mekânlar için idealdir. Doğal dokunun ön planda olmasının istendiği dikey ve yatay uygulamalarda kullanılabilir. Fonksiyonel alanlarda dolgulu veya fırçalı yüzeylerle kombinlenerek hem performans hem de estetik açıdan dengeli çözümler sunar. Tasarımcılar, doğal ahşap, beton ve metal elemanlarla birlikte kullanarak modern kurgularda organik bir vurgu elde eder.
TextSection.text3: 2 cm, 3 cm ve 5 cm kalınlıklarda sunulan büyük ebatlı plakalar, damar yönünün sürekliliğini koruyarak geniş yüzeylerde dingin bir akış sağlar. Tüm plakalar ölçüsel olarak stabil ve hassas kalibre edilmiş olup montajı kolaylaştırır. Kenarlar ham bırakılabilir veya yumuşatılmış pah ile işlenebilir. Uygulamada, doğal hissi korumak için nefes alabilen emprenyeler önerilir; yoğun reçine kaplamalardan kaçınılmalıdır. Majen, işleme ve paketleme aşamalarında her plakanın doğal yüzey bütünlüğünü titizlikle korur.
TextSection.header4: Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Travertende Neden Majen?
TextSection.text4: Majen, ocak seçiminden sevkiyata kadar tüm süreci kontrollü şekilde yöneterek gerçek doğal kalite ve tutarlılık sunar. Her dolgusu yapılmamış plaka; yüzey stabilitesi, renk uyumu ve damar netliği açısından tek tek incelenir. FOB/CIF şartları, güçlendirilmiş ahşap kasalar, menşe şahadetnamesi ve tam ihracat dokümantasyonu ile çalışırız. Doğal taş ihracatındaki uzun yıllara dayanan deneyimimiz, dünya genelindeki projeler için güvenilirlik, şeffaflık ve sürdürülebilir tedarik anlamına gelir.
TextSection.text5: Majen, Unfilled Natural Vein-Cut Traverten Plakaları; ISO sertifikalı süreçler ile dünya geneline ihraç eder. Açık gözenekli doku, özellikle nemli iklimlerde iyi bir tutuş ve nefes alabilirlik sağlar. Bakım için pH nötr, yumuşak temizleyiciler kullanılması ve toz emilimini sınırlamak amacıyla zaman zaman nefes alabilen emprenye uygulanması önerilir. Yüzey, zamanla doğal bir patina kazanarak travertenin özgün karakterini daha da belirgin hâle getirir.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: Dolgusuz traverteni benzersiz kılan nedir?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Doğal gözenekleri koruyarak ham, organik bir görünüm ve dolgulu yüzeylere göre daha iyi tutuş sağlar.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Ivory, Light ve Antico — her biri ton, doku ve damar sürekliliği açısından uyumlu olacak şekilde seçilir.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Dış mekân kullanımı için uygun mu?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Evet. Dolgusuz yüzey, açık alanlarda doğal kaymazlık ve zamana yayılan estetik bir yaşlanma sunar.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Doğal görünümü korumak için pH nötr temizleyiciler ve nefes alabilen emprenyeler kullanın; aşırı agresif kimyasallardan kaçının.

colors.title: Renk Seçenekleri: Ivory, Light ve Antico
colors.text: Farklı tasarım paletlerini karşılayabilmek için Majen, Ivory, Light ve Antico tonlarını sunar. Ivory; yumuşak, kesintili damarlarla birlikte sıcak krem zarafeti sağlar. Light; minimalist ve modern iç mekânlar için nötr bej bir zemin sunarken, Antico daha derin toprak tonlu karakteriyle rustik ve tarihi projelerde güçlü bir kontrast yaratır. Tüm renkler, geniş yüzeylerde ton ve desen sürekliliğini korumak için aynı ocak katmanlarından seçilir; bu sayede duvar ve zeminlerde damar eşleştirme ve book-match uygulamaları kolaylaşır.

ivory.metaDesc: Parlak fildişi tonlu, yüksek yansımaya sahip lüks traverten plakalar.
ivory.lead: Ayna etkili parlaklık, modern iç mekânları öne çıkarır.
ivory.intro: Cilalı yüzey, damar hareketini ve ışık yansımalarını vurgular.

applications.p: Öne çıkan zeminler, otel lobileri ve üst segment banyo/ıslak hacimler.

items.a: Islak alanlarda paspas kullanın veya honlu yüzey tercih edin.

light.metaDesc: Sıcak tonlu, zarif parlaklık sunan traverten plakalar.
light.lead: Üst segment alanlar için rafine bir ışıltı sağlar.
light.intro: Mekânın sıcaklığını ve görsel derinliğini artırarak yumuşak bir parlama etkisi yaratır.

applications.p: Resepsiyon zeminleri, vurgu duvarları ve perakende alanları.

items.q: Asitle aşınma ve lekelenme için ne yapmalıyım?
items.a: Yüzeyi uygun bir emprenye ile koruyun ve asidik temizleyicilerden kaçının.

antico.metaDesc: Klasik, zengin karakteri parlak derinlikle buluşturan traverten plakalar.
antico.lead: Geleneksel lüksü yeniden yorumlayan zarif bir görünüm.
antico.intro: Derin kontrastlar ve rafine yansımalar, taşın klasik karakterini güçlü biçimde öne çıkarır.

applications.p: Butikler, galeriler ve imza niteliğinde iç mekân tasarımları.

items.a: Sürekli ıslak veya kayma riski yüksek alanlarda cilalı yerine daha mat ve dokulu yüzeyleri tercih edin.

seo.title: Unilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs – Quarry Supplier from Turkey | Majen
seo.description: Discover Unilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs with mirror gloss, filled structure, and continuous linear veins. Ivory, Light, and Antico colors available for worldwide export.

unfilled-natural.h1: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
unfilled-natural.title: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
unfilled-natural.lead: Majen supplies Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. Cut parallel to the natural bedding layers, each slab reveals elegant continuous veins while preserving the stone’s open pores and authentic texture. This unfilled natural finish highlights the raw beauty of travertine, offering a tactile surface and soft matte tone ideal for rustic interiors, spa zones, and outdoor architecture. Durable, breathable, and visually organic—crafted for timeless design.
unfilled-natural.intro: Majen supplies Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. Cut parallel to the natural bedding layers, each slab reveals elegant continuous veins while preserving the stone’s open pores and authentic texture. This unfilled natural finish highlights the raw beauty of travertine, offering a tactile surface and soft matte tone ideal for rustic interiors, spa zones, and outdoor architecture. Durable, breathable, and visually organic—crafted for timeless design.
unfilled-natural.title2: What Is Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine?
unfilled-natural.intro2: “Vein Cut” exposes the stone’s natural linear veins running through each slab. “Unfilled” leaves the pores open for an authentic look and enhanced texture. This finish maintains natural breathability and a raw aesthetic, making it highly valued in Mediterranean and eco-friendly architecture. Majen hand-selects each block to ensure uniform coloration, accurate calibration, and true natural structure across large projects.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Unfilled Natural Vein Cut?

variants.title: Color Options: Ivory, Light, and Antico
variants.text: Majen offers Ivory, Light, and Antico tones to complement diverse architectural styles. Ivory provides subtle cream warmth perfect for open, bright interiors. Light offers a balanced beige neutrality suited for modern and minimalist design. Antico, with deeper earthy character, adds natural contrast for rustic and historical projects. All colors are sourced from the same quarry bench to ensure perfect hue and vein harmony throughout installations.

description: Authentic linear veins with natural pores left open for tactile texture and organic appearance. Sustainably sourced, durable, and suitable for both rustic and modern projects.
Offered in Ivory, Light, and Antico tones. Each color maintains native harmony and vein flow, creating warmth and balance in every environment.
Produced in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm. Large formats available for continuous vein alignment and easy installation.
Primary finish: Natural (Unfilled) with matte texture. Packed securely in reinforced wooden crates for worldwide export.

TextSection.header1: Advantages of the Unfilled Natural Finish on Vein Cut Slabs
TextSection.text1: Leaving travertine unfilled preserves its natural air pockets and organic texture. This approach provides a more natural slip resistance, enhances tactile depth, and expresses the raw geological origin of the material. Unfilled surfaces also promote better grip underfoot, especially in humid environments. Majen’s precise calibration ensures even thickness and minimal variation without compromising the stone’s authentic character.
TextSection.text2: Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs are ideal for outdoor terraces, facades, spa areas, garden walkways, and rustic interiors. They can be used in both vertical and horizontal applications where natural texture is desired. Pair with filled or brushed surfaces in adjacent spaces for contrast and practical performance. Designers often combine unfilled slabs with natural wood, concrete, and metal to highlight organic authenticity in modern contexts.
TextSection.text3: Available in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm thicknesses, with large-format slabs that preserve vein direction and continuity. All slabs are dimensionally stable and precisely calibrated for easy installation. Edges can be left raw or eased for a softened touch. For fabrication, use breathable sealers to maintain natural feel; avoid heavy resin coatings. Majen’s careful handling preserves each slab’s natural surface integrity during processing and packaging.
TextSection.header4: Why Choose Majen for Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine?
TextSection.text4: Majen controls the entire process—from quarry selection to export—ensuring true natural quality and consistency. Each unfilled slab is inspected for surface stability, color harmony, and linear vein clarity. We offer FOB/CIF terms with reinforced wooden crates, certificates of origin, and full export documentation. Our long-standing expertise in natural stone export guarantees reliability, transparency, and sustainable sourcing for global projects.
TextSection.text5: Majen exports Unfilled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs worldwide under ISO-certified processes. Their open-pore texture provides excellent traction and breathability for humid climates. To maintain the surface, use gentle pH-neutral cleaners and seal occasionally to limit dust absorption. The natural patina deepens with age, offering a unique, authentic look that matures beautifully over time.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_header: What makes unfilled travertine unique?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: It preserves natural pores, giving a raw, organic look and improved grip compared to filled surfaces.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Ivory, Light, and Antico — chosen for consistent hue, texture, and vein continuity across slabs.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Is it suitable for outdoor use?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: Yes. The unfilled surface naturally resists slipping and weathers gracefully in open-air environments.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Use neutral pH cleaners and breathable sealers to protect against dust and moisture while keeping the natural look intact.

colors.title: Color Options: Ivory, Light, and Antico
colors.text: To match different design palettes, Majen offers Ivory, Light, and Antico tones. Ivory delivers warm cream elegance with gentle, continuous veining; Light provides a neutral beige ideal for minimal interiors; Antico offers a slightly deeper, earthy character for richer contrasts. All colors are curated from the same quarry bench to keep hue and pattern continuity across large areas, enabling vein matching and seamless book-look layouts on walls and floors.

ivory.metaDesc: High-gloss luxury look with bright ivory tone.
ivory.intro: Polish emphasizes veining and light reflectance.

applications.p: Feature floors, hotel lobbies, premium bathrooms.

items.a: Use mats or consider honed for wet areas.
Seal and avoid acidic cleaners.

antico.metaDesc: Classic rich character with glossy depth.

items.a: Avoid consistently wet/slippery areas.

seo.title: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs – Quarry Supplier from Turkey | Majen
seo.description: Explore Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs with linear veins and balanced natural texture. Ivory, Light, and Antico tones available for worldwide export.

filled-natural.h1: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
filled-natural.title: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs
filled-natural.lead: Majen supplies Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. Each slab is cut parallel to the natural bedding layers, revealing continuous linear veins and balanced tone movement. The filled natural finish enhances stability and ease of maintenance while preserving authentic color and surface character. Perfect for interior floors, walls, and large architectural projects that demand durability with timeless natural beauty.
filled-natural.intro: Majen supplies Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry in Turkey. Each slab is cut parallel to the natural bedding layers, revealing continuous linear veins and balanced tone movement. The filled natural finish enhances stability and ease of maintenance while preserving authentic color and surface character. Perfect for interior floors, walls, and large architectural projects that demand durability with timeless natural beauty.
filled-natural.title2: What Is Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine?
filled-natural.intro2: “Vein Cut” travertine is sliced along its natural layers, exposing elegant, directional veins that flow smoothly across the surface. “Filled” slabs have natural cavities sealed for density and cleanliness, while “Natural” preserves the original tone and soft texture. This finish combines technical reliability with authentic, organic aesthetics—ideal for both modern and classical spaces. Majen ensures consistent pattern alignment and color harmony across all slabs.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Filled Natural Vein Cut?

variants.title: Color Options: Ivory, Light, and Antico
variants.text: Majen offers Ivory, Light, and Antico tones in Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs. Ivory creates warm sophistication with subtle linear movement. Light offers calm beige tones for minimalist interiors, and Antico brings deeper earthy contrast for rustic elegance. All colors are carefully selected from the same quarry bench to ensure consistent hue, vein direction, and visual rhythm across installations.

description: Quarry-direct slabs with strong linear veins, filled for stability, and natural surface preserved for timeless charm. Durable, refined, and authentically elegant.
Available in Ivory, Light, and Antico tones. Each offers distinctive warmth and visual balance while maintaining pattern consistency.
Produced in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm. Large formats ensure continuous vein direction and seamless installation.
Primary finish: Natural with filled structure. Slabs are packed in reinforced wooden crates with moisture protection for global export.

TextSection.header1: Advantages of the Filled Natural Finish on Vein Cut Slabs
TextSection.text1: The filled natural finish delivers the perfect balance between strength and authenticity. Filled pores increase durability and simplify cleaning, while the natural surface preserves true stone character. Linear veining enhances spatial flow and adds architectural rhythm to interior designs. Majen’s precise filling and calibration ensure dimensional accuracy and long-term performance for all applications.
TextSection.text2: Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs are perfect for wall cladding, floors, facades, and staircases. Their linear pattern brings depth and movement, ideal for hotel lobbies, residences, and commercial interiors. Pair with honed or brushed surfaces to create contrast while maintaining material unity. Majen’s cut-to-size service allows continuous vein matching across large projects for flawless visual consistency.
TextSection.text3: Produced in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm thicknesses, with large-format options for seamless layouts. Each slab is precisely filled and calibrated to maintain even thickness and pattern flow. Edges can be straight or eased according to project specifications. Fabrication notes: align vein direction during installation, apply breathable sealers, and avoid heavy resin coatings to maintain natural appeal.
TextSection.header4: Why Choose Majen for Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine?
TextSection.text4: Majen manages the entire process from quarry extraction to export, ensuring quality and consistency. Each slab is hand-selected for clarity of veins, color balance, and structure. We provide FOB/CIF shipping with reinforced wooden crates, full documentation, and export certificates. With strong logistics and sustainable practices, Majen guarantees reliability and excellence for every international order.
TextSection.text5: Majen exports Filled Natural Vein Cut Travertine Slabs worldwide, meeting ISO-certified standards for surface finish and dimensional accuracy. This combination brings together rustic authenticity and sophisticated luxury—perfect for refined architectural interiors.

seo.title: Wholesale Travertine Slabs Blaundos Antico | Majen

antiko.title: Wholesale Travertine Slabs Blaundos Antico
antiko.intro: Blaundos Antico travertine is a warm, beige-toned stone with antique character and subtle movement that suits both classic and contemporary designs. Sourced directly from our Uşak–Ulubey region, Majen supplies wholesale slabs with consistent grading, reliable lead times, and reinforced packaging for export. Architects, importers, and contractors choose this variety for durable floors, façades, countertops, and bespoke interior features, achieving timeless elegance with dependable performance across residential and commercial projects.
antiko.alt: Wholesale Blaundos Antiko travertine slabs from Turkey
antiko.title2: Why Choose Blaundos Antico Travertine Slabs?
antiko.intro2: Blaundos Antico stands out for its earthy palette, nuanced veining, and antique texture that adds depth without overpowering a space. Its density and calibrated finishes support heavy-traffic areas while remaining easy to maintain. With quarry-direct sourcing, Majen controls selection and grading, ensuring predictable results at scale. Competitive pricing, flexible MOQs, and project-matched lots help streamline specifications. For large orders, we provide sample boards and detailed QC reports, enabling confident decisions for global builds.
description: Why choose Blaundos Antiko slabs: antique-inspired look, expressive veining, bookmatch options and strong continuity on large surfaces. Excellent balance of authenticity and durability for premium interiors.

Sourced and processed in Uşak–Ulubey. Used in island countertops, bathroom vanities, reception desks, wall cladding, elevator surrounds and luxury retail fixtures. Shade-verified lots for consistent project outcomes.

cards.text1: From luxury hospitality to private villas, Blaundos Antico adapts to varied aesthetics. Its neutral warmth pairs well with wood, metal, and glass, allowing cohesive palettes in mixed-material schemes. Designers value its ability to soften minimal interiors or enrich traditional settings with organic texture. Available finishes expand possibilities, from refined polished looks to tactile brushed or tumbled surfaces ideal for outdoor paths and pool surrounds. The result is a reliable, elegant stone that elevates spaces without visual noise.
cards.text2: Calibrated thickness, consistent flatness, and suitable surface treatments help Blaundos Antico perform in lobbies, corridors, and retail zones. Anti-slip options support safety outdoors, while proper sealing enhances stain resistance indoors. With accurate cutting and tight tolerances, installers achieve clean joints and level surfaces, reducing rework and time on site. This blend of aesthetics and practicality positions Blaundos Antico as a proven specification for demanding, design-driven environments across climates and usage patterns.

ApplicationSection.title: Applications of Blaundos Antico Travertine Slabs
ApplicationSection.text: Blaundos Antico is specified for floors, wall cladding, countertops, fireplace surrounds, stair treads, and exterior façades. Its antique texture lends character to boutique hotels and residences, while honed or polished finishes suit refined interiors. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled slabs complement landscaping, garden paths, and pool decks. The stone’s tonal stability supports continuity between inside and outside, helping designers create cohesive transitions. With accurate sizing and reliable supply, it scales from small renovations to flagship builds.
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, Blaundos Antico brings warmth to living areas and statement value to feature walls or reception desks. In kitchens and baths, sealed surfaces provide practical durability with natural beauty. Externally, its weathered look enriches patios and façades, aging gracefully over time. For public spaces, coordinated formats (slabs, tiles, custom pieces) keep design language consistent. Majen’s technical support advises on finish selection, slip ratings, and maintenance to match climate, footfall, and performance requirements.

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Majen supplies slabs commonly at 2 cm and 3 cm thickness, cut from blocks selected for tone and structure. Custom dimensions can be produced on request, including book-matched sets for feature walls. Tight calibration and precision polishing ensure flatness and clean edges that speed installation. For special elements—vanities, stair treads, or oversized cladding—our team provides cut-to-size options that maintain vein continuity. Consistent sizing across batches supports predictable waste rates and accurate take-offs.
AvailableSection.subtitle: Dimensional Tolerances
AvailableSection.subtext: Slab thickness is controlled within industry tolerances to support even load distribution and dependable adhesion. Surface regularity reduces lippage risk on large floors, while square edges and stable geometry help installers achieve fine joints in visual-critical areas. For ventilated façades and lightweight assemblies, we coordinate with fabricators to meet bracket and anchor constraints. All dimensions are verified at dispatch, and reports are available for documentation and submittal packages when required.

FinishesSection.title: Finishes & Packaging Options
FinishesSection.text: Blaundos Antico can be supplied polished, honed, brushed, or tumbled to align with design intent and slip resistance needs. Finishes are applied with calibrated equipment to keep tone and sheen consistent across lots. For export, slabs are packed in reinforced wooden bundles with corner guards, interleaves, and strapping that limits movement in transit. Moisture-resistant wrapping and clear labeling aid handling at ports and job sites. Packaging is optimized for container loading to minimize risk and freight costs.
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: Select polished for premium interiors, honed for low-glare sophistication, brushed where texture is desired, and tumbled for rustic, outdoor-ready charm. In wet areas or exterior paths, combine texture with appropriate sealers to improve maintenance and slip performance. We can supply matched samples across finishes so teams preview appearance under project lighting. This process helps align expectations early, reducing change orders and helping stakeholders approve materials quickly and confidently.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Each bundle is photographed and measured prior to loading. Straps, braces, and internal blocking limit vibration, while protective interlayers reduce abrasion. Bundle IDs map to packing lists for fast checks at customs and on site. Shock indicators can be added on request. The goal is simple: slabs arrive installation-ready, with documentation that keeps receiving and quality verification efficient for importers and contractors.

PartnerSection.title: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Slabs?
PartnerSection.description: Beyond quarry access, Majen offers technical guidance, flexible MOQs, and dependable lead times that fit real-world schedules. Direct sourcing keeps costs predictable and ensures tone matching across lots. Reinforced packaging, thorough documentation, and responsive support reduce friction during shipping and receiving. We build long-term relationships with importers, distributors, and contractors, providing post-delivery assistance and repeatable quality so projects finish on brief, on budget, and on time.
PartnerSection.text1: From sampling and mock-ups to installation advice, our team responds quickly with practical guidance. Multilingual communication, transparent timelines, and after-sales follow-up help keep stakeholders aligned. Whether you need book-matched features, custom cuts, or coordinated tiles, we manage details and share progress so decisions stay informed.
PartnerSection.text2: We prioritize responsible quarrying, water recycling, and waste reduction. Material traceability and documentation support green building goals and client ESG policies. These practices contribute to durable, long-life installations with lower lifecycle impact.
PartnerSection.text3: We provide packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes; optional lab tests and slip ratings can be arranged. This documentation simplifies import processes and supports submittals for architects and contractors, helping approvals proceed without delays.

ExportSection.title: Travertine Slab Export Process
ExportSection.text: We coordinate the entire export cycle—from quarry selection and block cutting to finishing, inspection, and documentation. Orders include commercial invoice, packing list, and certificate of origin. With FOB and CIF terms available, our logistics team manages bookings, customs, and container optimization to protect material and timelines. Pre-shipment photos and QC summaries provide transparency. This streamlined process reduces administrative load for buyers and helps large projects maintain predictable schedules worldwide.

QualitySection.title: Quality Control & Grading of Slabs
QualitySection.text: Every Blaundos Antico slab is graded against criteria such as thickness accuracy, surface finish, color consistency, porosity, and structural soundness. We map natural features and exclude pieces that fall outside A-grade expectations for high-visibility applications. Moisture and adhesion checks support performance goals, while calibrated polishing ensures sheen uniformity. Clients can request detailed grading reports and photos to validate quality remotely. Only lots that meet specification proceed to packing and shipment.
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection verifies dimensions, flatness, edge quality, fill integrity, and finish continuity. Vein movement is evaluated for harmonious sequencing, especially for book-matched features. Any repairs are stabilized and re-finished to blend visually. Documentation captures measurements and observations so buyers can archive data for submittals and warranties. This disciplined process lowers on-site risk and supports consistent installation outcomes.

TextSection.text1: Explore complementary selections that pair well with Blaundos Antico. Each variety offers distinct tone and movement for different design intents, enabling cohesive palettes across floors, walls, and façades. Discover Blaundos Light Slabs for brighter schemes and Blaundos Ivory Slabs for creamy warmth. Coordinate with Travertine Tiles or Travertine Blocks to extend the language of natural stone through interiors, exteriors, and custom elements while keeping sourcing streamlined under one partner.
TextSection.text2: Ideal for kitchen islands, vanities and lobby walls. Pair with vein-cut bookmatch for dramatic continuity; specify 20–30 mm for interiors, 30+ mm for high-stress zones.
TextSection.text3: Reinforced A-frames, corner and moisture protection, photo-documented loading and shared seal numbers. FOB İzmir or CIF to major ports.

items.a: Its antique texture, warm beige tones, and subtle veining create sophisticated, timeless surfaces suited to both classic and modern designs.
Yes. Brushed or tumbled finishes with proper sealing are recommended for paths, pool decks, and façades.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Travertine Tiles?

description: High durability, precise cutting, and quarry-direct sourcing from Uşak–Ulubey make Majen a trusted supplier of Wholesale Travertine Tiles. Our tiles provide consistent sizing, A-grade quality, and secure packaging for reliable international supply.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: STravertine tiles are offered in 30×60, 60×60, and 40×80 cm, with thickness options from 1–2 cm.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: What finishes can be applied to travertine tiles?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Tiles are available in polished, honed, brushed, and tumbled finishes for different design needs.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: Do you export tiles worldwide?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: TYes. Majen exports Wholesale Travertine Tiles with FOB and CIF terms, providing full export documentation.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_header: How are tiles packaged for shipping?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq4_text: Tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates, strapped and wrapped to ensure safe container loading for sea freight.

cuts.heading: Travertine Slabs Cut Options

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Travertine neww? jkgj

description: High durability, quarry-direct sourcing from Uşak–Ulubey, and precise cutting deliver consistent A-grade travertine slabs. Reliable lead times and reinforced packing make Majen a trusted partner for global projects.

Travertine slabs are used for countertops, wall cladding, interior floors and exterior façades in residential, hospitality and commercial developments. Blaundos Antiko, Light and Ivory offer distinct tones for different design intents.
Standard production in 2 cm, 3 cm and 5 cm thickness. Common sizes include large formats suitable for efficient fabrication, reducing waste and ensuring predictable results at scale.
Available finishes: polished, honed, brushed, tumbled. Slabs are packed in reinforced wooden crates, strapped and wrapped for safe container loading and long-distance sea freight.

variants.title: Filled and Unfilled Surface Options
variants.text: Majen’s Vein Cut Travertine Slabs are available in filled and unfilled varieties to match different design needs. Filled slabs are treated with resin or cement for dense, polished surfaces ideal for luxury interiors. Unfilled slabs preserve natural pores, showcasing authentic texture preferred for rustic and outdoor spaces. Every slab is meticulously inspected, reinforced, and documented before shipment to guarantee flawless international delivery.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Vein-Cut Travertine?

description: Sourced directly from our Uşak–Ulubey quarry, Majen’s Vein Cut Travertine Slabsdeliver clear, continuous linear veins with reliable color harmony. Each blockis hand-selected, precisely cut, and reinforced for export, ensuring consistentA-grade quality and predictable results on large, directional designs.

Ideal for interiors where flow and rhythm matter: hotel lobbies, long corridors,wall cladding, floors, reception desks, and feature walls. The parallel vein structureenhances spatial continuity and modern aesthetics, while matching tiles allow seamlesstransitions across rooms.

Standard production in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm. Common large formats are available forefficient fabrication and vein matching across panels. Tight calibration and thicknesscontrol reduce waste, speed installation, and maintain visual continuity in expansivesurfaces.

Available finishes: honed, polished, brushed, tumbled in filled or unfilled options.Slabs are strapped and wrapped in reinforced wooden crates with moisture protectionand corner guards for safe container loading and long-distance sea freight.

seo.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Antico | Majen
seo.description: Rustic, elegant Blaundos Antico travertine tiles from Turkey. Quarry‑direct, A‑grade, export‑ready. Finishes, sizes, and global delivery by Majen.

antiko.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Antico
antiko.intro: Blaundos Antico travertine tiles feature warm beige tones and an antique character that adds depth and authenticity to interior and exterior spaces. Sourced directly from our Uşak–Ulubey region, Majen supplies wholesale tiles graded for tone harmony and dimensional accuracy. Designers specify this variety for floors, walls, and feature surfaces where rustic elegance meets modern performance. Reinforced packaging, clear documentation, and reliable lead times make it project‑ready for global delivery.
antiko.alt: Wholesale Blaundos Antiko travertine slabs from Turkey
antiko.title2: Why Choose Blaundos Antico Travertine Tiles?
antiko.intro2: Blaundos Antico stands out with tactile textures and nuanced veining that create a timeless atmosphere. Its earthy palette pairs naturally with wood, metal, and plaster finishes. With quarry‑direct sourcing, Majen controls selection and grading across lots, ensuring consistent tone and surface quality. Flexible MOQs and competitive pricing support both boutique and multi‑phase programs. Samples and QC reports help teams approve materials quickly with confidence.
description: Why choose Blaundos Antiko slabs: antique-inspired look, expressive veining, bookmatch options and strong continuity on large surfaces. Excellent balance of authenticity and durability for premium interiors.

Sourced and processed in Uşak–Ulubey. Used in island countertops, bathroom vanities, reception desks, wall cladding, elevator surrounds and luxury retail fixtures. Shade-verified lots for consistent project outcomes.

cards.text1: From rustic villas to contemporary hospitality, these tiles balance character and calm. Use smaller formats for patterns (herringbone, French pattern) or large formats for clean, modern layouts. Available finishes expand possibilities—honed for subtle elegance, brushed or tumbled for texture and outdoor traction, polished for select statement zones where sheen is desired.
cards.text2: Calibrated thickness and stable geometry support tight joints and level surfaces in lobbies, corridors, and residential spaces. Proper sealing enhances stain resistance indoors; textured finishes improve slip confidence in wet areas and outdoors. Consistency across lots reduces on‑site adjustments and supports predictable schedules for contractors and installers.

ApplicationSection.title: Applications of Blaundos Antico Travertine Tiles
ApplicationSection.text: Ideal for floors, wall cladding, showers, kitchen splashes, fireplace surrounds, and outdoor terraces. The antique texture enriches boutique hotels and homes, while honed finishes suit refined interiors. Coordinated formats and trims enable visual continuity across rooms and from interior to exterior spaces, supporting cohesive design language throughout the project.'
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, honed tiles deliver soft matte refinement; in bathrooms and kitchens, sealers support maintenance. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled textures age gracefully and retain color clarity on paths and patios. With consistent tone and calibrated edges, installers achieve neat grout lines and predictable waste rates in both residential and commercial settings.

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Common tile sizes include modular sets (French pattern), 30×60, 60×60, and larger formats where feasible. Standard thicknesses are around 10–12 mm, with other options upon request. Tiles are cut, calibrated, and chamfered as needed to support clean alignment and safe edges. Book‑matched features are available for special walls using coordinated slabs and tiles.
AvailableSection.subtitle: Dimensional Tolerances
AvailableSection.subtext: Thickness control, surface regularity, and square geometry reduce lippage risk and support reliable adhesion over large areas. For exterior installations, we coordinate with contractors on substrate prep, movement joints, and drainage. Measurements are verified before dispatch; dimensional reports can be provided for submittals and QA documentation when requested.

FinishesSection.title: Finishes & Packaging Options
FinishesSection.text: Choose honed for low‑glare sophistication, brushed or tumbled for tactile character and traction, and polished where sheen is desired indoors. Finishes are applied with calibrated equipment to keep tone and sheen consistent across lots. For export, tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates with corner guards and moisture‑resistant wraps, optimized for container loading and long‑distance sea freight.
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: We guide finish selection by location, foot traffic, and maintenance goals. Multi‑finish sample sets help stakeholders preview appearance under project lighting, aligning expectations early and minimizing change orders.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Crates are measured and photographed prior to loading. Internal dividers and protective interlayers minimize vibration and abrasion. Crate IDs map to packing lists for fast checks at customs and on site; optional shock indicators are available on request.

PartnerSection.title: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Tiles?
PartnerSection.description: Beyond quarry access, Majen offers technical guidance, flexible MOQs, and dependable lead times. Direct sourcing supports cost control and tone matching across lots. Reinforced packaging, thorough documentation, and responsive support reduce friction through shipping and receiving, helping projects finish on brief and on time.
PartnerSection.text1: Fast sampling, mock‑ups, and practical installation advice keep decisions informed. Multilingual communication and transparent timelines align stakeholders from specification to handover.
PartnerSection.text2: Responsible quarrying, water recycling, and waste reduction are prioritized. Traceability and documentation support green building goals and ESG policies.'
PartnerSection.text3: Packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes are provided; optional lab tests and slip ratings can be arranged to simplify submittals and approvals.

ExportSection.title: Travertine Tile Export Process
ExportSection.text: Majen manages quarry selection, cutting, finishing, inspection, and documentation. Orders include commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin. Under FOB or CIF terms, logistics coordinates bookings, customs, and container optimization. Pre‑shipment photos and QC summaries add transparency for remote teams and keep programs on schedule.

QualitySection.title: Quality Control & Grading of Tiles
QualitySection.text: Tiles are graded for thickness accuracy, surface finish, tone consistency, porosity, and structural soundness. Natural features are mapped; pieces outside A‑grade expectations are removed from high‑visibility lots. Calibrated honing/brushing ensures uniform texture. Detailed grading reports and photos can be shared for remote validation prior to shipment.
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection verifies dimensions, flatness, edge quality, fill integrity, and finish continuity. Pattern compatibility and tone harmony are checked to support pleasing layouts. Documentation captures measurements and observations for submittals and warranties, lowering on‑site risk and supporting consistent installation outcomes.

TextSection.text1: Coordinate tiles with Blaundos Antico slabs for feature walls or counters. Explore Blaundos Light and Blaundos Ivory for brighter schemes. Pair with trims and thresholds to maintain continuity across rooms and between indoor and outdoor spaces.
TextSection.text2: Ideal for kitchen islands, vanities and lobby walls. Pair with vein-cut bookmatch for dramatic continuity; specify 20–30 mm for interiors, 30+ mm for high-stress zones.
TextSection.text3: Reinforced A-frames, corner and moisture protection, photo-documented loading and shared seal numbers. FOB İzmir or CIF to major ports.

items.q: Can Blaundos Antico tiles be used in wet areas?
items.a: Yes. Use brushed or tumbled textures and appropriate sealing for showers, entries, and pool surrounds.

items.q: What are common tile sizes and thicknesses?
items.a: Popular sizes include French pattern, 30×60 and 60×60; typical thickness is around 10–12 mm. Custom formats may be available on request.
Honed, brushed, tumbled, and polished (for select interiors). We help match finishes to traffic and maintenance requirements.
Yes. We ship under FOB or CIF terms with full documentation and logistics support.

items.q: How are tiles packaged for export?
items.a: In reinforced wooden crates with dividers, interlayers, corner guards, and moisture‑resistant wraps.

The luminous tone suits bright interiors, while brushed or tumbled finishes enrich outdoor patios and pool surrounds. Coordinated trims and slabs enable visual continuity across rooms and inside‑out transitions in residential and commercial projects.
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, honed tiles deliver soft refinement, while polished finishes provide premium sheen. In bathrooms and kitchens, sealing supports easy maintenance. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled surfaces age gracefully and retain clarity. Coordinated tile and slab formats ensure cohesive design across public and private spaces.

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Standard sizes include 30×60, 60×60, and modular French patterns, with larger formats on request. Typical thickness ranges from 10–12 mm. Tiles are cut, calibrated, and chamfered to ensure safe edges and clean joints. Book‑matched sets and cut‑to‑size features can be produced for special applications in walls and counters.

For exterior settings, we coordinate with contractors on substrate prep, expansion joints, and drainage. Measurements are verified before dispatch; dimensional reports are available for submittals and QA documentation.'

FinishesSection.text: Choose honed for subtle elegance, brushed or tumbled for outdoor grip, and polished for high‑end interiors. All finishes are applied with calibrated machinery to ensure tone and sheen consistency. For export, tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates with internal dividers, moisture protection, and optimized loading for sea freight.'
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: Finish choice depends on traffic, lighting, and maintenance goals. We provide sample sets across finishes to help stakeholders preview results under project lighting, reducing approval time and surprises during installation.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Crates are photographed and logged before shipping. Internal blocking and separators minimize vibration and abrasion. Each crate ID is linked to packing lists for easy customs clearance and on‑site checks. Optional shock indicators can be added.

Under FOB or CIF terms, logistics coordinates bookings, customs, and container optimization. Pre‑shipment QC photos provide transparency for buyers

Calibrated finishes ensure uniform appearance. Grading reports and photos can be shared for remote approvals.'
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection covers dimensions, flatness, edge quality, and tone harmony. Pattern alignment and finish continuity are checked to ensure seamless installation. Documentation provides traceability for submittals and warranties.

PartnerSection.text2: Responsible quarrying, water recycling, and waste reduction are central to Majen operations. Full traceability supports ESG and green building goals
PartnerSection.text3: Packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes are provided. Optional slip tests and lab reports can be arranged for submittals and compliance.

TextSection.text1: Pair Blaundos Light tiles with slabs for feature walls or counters. Explore Blaundos Ivory for creamy tones or Blaundos Antico for rustic character. Coordinate trims and thresholds to ensure seamless inside‑out design.'

items.q: Can Blaundos Light tiles be used outdoors?'
items.a: Yes. Brushed or tumbled finishes with sealing are recommended for terraces, pool surrounds, and paths.

seo.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Ivory | Majen
seo.description: Creamy, elegant Blaundos Ivory travertine tiles from Turkey. Quarry‑direct, A‑grade, export‑ready. Finishes, sizes, and global delivery by Majen.

ivory.title: Wholesale Travertine Tiles Blaundos Ivory
ivory.intro: Blaundos Ivory travertine tiles present creamy ivory tones with fine, linear veining that create bright, quietly luxurious surfaces. Sourced directly from our Uşak–Ulubey region, Majen supplies wholesale tiles graded for tone harmony and dimensional precision. Designers specify this variety for upscale, light‑forward interiors and coordinated exteriors. Reinforced packaging, clear documentation, and reliable lead times make it export‑ready for global programs.
ivory.title2: Why Choose Blaundos Ivory Travertine Tiles?
ivory.intro2: Blaundos Ivory offers a calm, creamy palette that elevates spaces without visual clutter. Subtle movement pairs naturally with light woods, brass, and soft textiles. With quarry‑direct control, Majen matches tones and grades across lots for predictable outcomes at scale. Flexible MOQs, competitive pricing, and sample boards simplify specification and approvals
ivory.alt: Wholesale Blaundos Ivory travertine slabs from Turkey
description: Preferred where a light, refined aesthetic is required.
High suitability for vanities, wall panels and bright retail concepts.

cards.text1: The neutral ivory base fits minimalist, Mediterranean, and contemporary luxury schemes. Use honed for soft matte refinement, brushed or tumbled for tactile traction in outdoor areas, and polished for select interior features. Modular patterns and large formats support both classic detail and sleek expanses.
cards.text2: Calibrated thickness and stable geometry support tight joints and level surfaces in busy environments. Proper sealing enhances stain resistance indoors; textured finishes improve slip confidence outdoors. Consistency across lots reduces on‑site adjustments and supports reliable schedules and budgets.

ApplicationSection.title: Applications of Blaundos Ivory Travertine Tiles
ApplicationSection.text: Suitable for floors, walls, showers, kitchens, fireplace surrounds, stair treads, and outdoor terraces. The creamy tone brightens interiors while brushed or tumbled finishes enrich patios and pool surrounds. Coordinated trims and slabs enable continuous design language across rooms and from interior to exterior spaces.
ApplicationSection.subtitle: Interior & Exterior Use Cases
ApplicationSection.subtext: Indoors, honed tiles deliver low‑glare elegance; polished offers a premium sheen for feature zones. In wet areas, sealing aids maintenance. Outdoors, brushed or tumbled textures age gracefully and retain color clarity. Coordinated tile and slab formats help maintain cohesive design across public and private spaces

AvailableSection.title: Available Sizes & Thickness
AvailableSection.text: Common sizes include 30×60, 60×60, and modular French patterns; larger formats are possible on request. Typical thickness ranges 10–12 mm. Tiles are cut, calibrated, and chamfered for clean joints and safe edges. Book‑matched sets and cut‑to‑size features can be produced for statement walls and counters.
AvailableSection.subtitle: Dimensional Tolerances
AvailableSection.subtext: Tight thickness control, surface regularity, and squareness lower lippage risk and support reliable adhesion across large areas. For exteriors, we coordinate on substrate prep, movement joints, and drainage. Measurements are verified before dispatch; dimensional reports can be provided for submittals and QA.

FinishesSection.title: Finishes & Packaging Options
FinishesSection.text: Choose honed for subtle refinement, brushed or tumbled for traction and texture, and polished for high‑end interiors. Finishes are applied with calibrated machinery for consistent tone and sheen. For export, tiles are packed in reinforced wooden crates with dividers and moisture‑resistant wraps, optimized for sea freight.
FinishesSection.subtitle: Surface Finish Guidance
FinishesSection.subtext: We advise finishes based on traffic, lighting, and maintenance goals. Multi‑finish sample sets help stakeholders preview appearance under project lighting, reducing change orders and accelerating approvals.
FinishesSection.subtext2: Crates are photographed and logged prior to loading. Internal blocking and protective interlayers minimize vibration and abrasion. Crate IDs link to packing lists for fast customs and on‑site checks. Optional shock indicators are available upon request

PartnerSection.title: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Tiles?
PartnerSection.description: Majen offers technical guidance, flexible MOQs, and dependable lead times. Direct sourcing supports cost control and tone matching across lots. Reinforced packaging, thorough documentation, and responsive support reduce friction from shipping to receiving.
PartnerSection.text1: Rapid sampling, mock‑ups, and practical installation advice keep decisions informed. Multilingual communication and transparent timelines align stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
PartnerSection.text2: Responsible quarrying, water recycling, and waste reduction are prioritized. Traceability and documentation support ESG and green building goals.
PartnerSection.text3: Packing data, certificates of origin, and HS codes are provided; optional lab tests and slip ratings can be arranged to simplify submittals and approvals.

ExportSection.title: Travertine Tile Export Process
ExportSection.text: Majen manages quarry selection, cutting, finishing, inspection, and documentation. Orders include commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin. Under FOB or CIF terms, logistics coordinates bookings, customs, and container optimization. Pre‑shipment QC photos provide transparency for remote teams.'

QualitySection.title: Quality Control & Grading of Tiles
QualitySection.text: Tiles are graded for thickness accuracy, finish uniformity, tone consistency, and structural soundness. Natural features are mapped; pieces outside A‑grade expectations are removed from premium lots. Calibrated finishing ensures visual continuity. Grading reports and photos can be shared for remote validation.'
QualitySection.subtitle: Inspection Criteria
QualitySection.subtext: Inspection verifies dimensions, flatness, edge quality, fill integrity, and tone harmony. Pattern alignment and finish continuity are checked to support seamless installation. Documentation captures measurements for submittals and warranties.

TextSection.text1: Coordinate Blaundos Ivory tiles with slabs for feature walls or counters. Explore Blaundos Light for brighter schemes or Blaundos Antico for rustic warmth. Use trims and thresholds to maintain continuity across rooms and indoor–outdoor transitions.

items.q: Are Blaundos Ivory tiles suitable for outdoor use?
items.a: Yes. Brushed or tumbled finishes with sealing are recommended for terraces, pool surrounds, and paths.

items.q: What sizes and thicknesses are available?
items.a: Common sizes include 30×60, 60×60, and modular French patterns; typical thickness is 10–12 mm. Customs may be available on request.

pavers.title: Wholesale Travertine Special Designs
pavers.intro: Majen designs and manufactures Custom Travertine Designs, including steps, stair treads, risers, pool copings, mosaics, borders, thresholds, sills, columns, and other cut-to-size pieces. Produced in Blaundos Antiko, Light, and Ivory, each item is crafted to project specs with CNC profiling and edge detailing. Reinforced crates and clear labelling make installation faster on site. Importers rely on Majen for Custom Travertine Designs with consistent quality and FOB/CIF export options.
pavers.title2: Why Choose Wholesale Travertine Special Designs ?
pavers.intro2: Custom Travertine Designs offer unique value for villas, hotels, retail and public spaces where standard tiles or slabs are not enough. Majen’s quarry-direct supply, certified inspections and CAD-to-production workflow reduce errors and lead times. Our team collaborates with architects and contractors to match finishes, edges and radiuses across the project, ensuring design consistency and predictable outcomes at scale.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Travertine Special Designs?

description: Majen is a trusted supplier of Wholesale Travertine Special Designs, offering steps, mosaics, borders, and unique architectural elements crafted from Blaundos travertine. Our designs combine durability with timeless aesthetics and are reinforced for secure international shipments.

Special travertine pieces are ideal for staircases, poolsides, hotel lobbies, villas, and custom architectural projects. Blaundos Antiko, Light, and Ivory provide versatile tones, enabling designers and importers to meet diverse creative needs.

Travertine special designs are available in thicknesses from 2–5 cm, with custom dimensions available on request. Every bespoke piece is cut and finished with precision to ensure accuracy, stability, and consistency across large projects.

Custom designs are available in polished, honed, brushed, and tumbled finishes. For export, each item is carefully packed in reinforced wooden crates with nylon wrapping and metal strapping, ensuring safe container loading and delivery worldwide.

variants.heading: Travertine Special Desing Varieties
variants.text: Majen offers three primary types of Wholesale Travertine Special Designs: Blaundos Antiko, Blaundos Light, and Blaundos Ivory. Each variety is crafted with precision at our Uşak–Ulubey quarry, ensuring durability, consistent texture, and aesthetic value. Export-ready and reinforced for sea freight, these bespoke travertine designs are trusted by architects, importers, and wholesalers worldwide.

TextSection.text1: Majen manages the Travertine Special Design Export Process from precise quarry cutting to container loading. Each piece is documented with invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin, then secured in reinforced wooden crates for sea freight. With FOB and CIF terms, importers benefit from a transparent, safe, and reliable supply chain, ensuring stair steps, mosaics, borders, and decorative elements arrive on time.
TextSection.header2: Quality Control & Grading of Special Designs
TextSection.text2: Quality Control & Grading of Special Designs includes inspections of thickness tolerance, surface finish, edge stability, and color consistency. Only A-grade pieces pass final checks and are packed in protective crates to reduce breakage risks. This process minimizes waste on-site and ensures architects and contractors receive reliable products for villas, hotels, and signature projects.
TextSection.header3: Global Markets & Applications for Special Designs
TextSection.text3: Global Markets & Applications for Special Designs include high-end residential, hospitality, and commercial projects across Europe, the USA, and the Middle East. Travertine steps, pool surrounds, mosaics, and façade elements in Blaundos Antiko, Light, and Ivory are used to enhance both interior and exterior spaces. Consistent production and reinforced packing guarantee secure supply for large-scale shipments.
TextSection.header4: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Special Designs?
TextSection.text4: Why Partner with Majen for Travertine Special Designs? Because Majen is more than a quarry — we are an experienced export partner. Direct sourcing from Uşak–Ulubey ensures stable production, competitive pricing, and flexible custom options. With reinforced packaging, complete documentation, and long-term client relationships, Majen is trusted worldwide for bespoke travertine elements.
TextSection.subtext1: Average block size is 280×220×200 cm with natural surfaces. Export-ready, suitable for bulk orders, with reinforced packaging for container loading.
TextSection.subtext2: Countertops, wall cladding, flooring, and exterior façades where durability and natural elegance are required.
TextSection.subtext3: Polished, honed, tumbled, and brushed surfaces to match diverse design requirements and performance needs.
TextSection.subtext4: Custom designs elevate aesthetics and provide exclusive solutions while preserving travertine’s natural durability and texture.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: Steps, mosaics, borders, columns, and bespoke architectural elements crafted from Blaundos travertine.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Do you export special designs worldwide?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Yes. Majen exports Wholesale Travertine Special Designs globally with FOB and CIF terms.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_header: How are custom travertine pieces packaged for shipping?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq3_text: All designs are packed in reinforced wooden crates, strapped and wrapped to ensure safe transport.

cuts.heading: Travertine Special Design Cut Options
cuts.text: Choose honed for subtle refinement, brushed or tumbled for traction and texture, and polished for high-end interiors.

detailsHeadings.title1: Why Our Travertine neww? jkgj

description: High durability, quarry-direct sourcing from Uşak–Ulubey, and precise cutting deliver consistent A-grade travertine slabs. Reliable lead times and reinforced packing make Majen a trusted partner for global projects.

Travertine slabs are used for countertops, wall cladding, interior floors and exterior façades in residential, hospitality and commercial developments. Blaundos Antiko, Light and Ivory offer distinct tones for different design intents.
Standard production in 2 cm, 3 cm and 5 cm thickness. Common sizes include large formats suitable for efficient fabrication, reducing waste and ensuring predictable results at scale.
Available finishes: polished, honed, brushed, tumbled. Slabs are packed in reinforced wooden crates, strapped and wrapped for safe container loading and long-distance sea freight.

vein-cut.desc: Vein Cut Travertine Slabs reveal the natural linear veins of the stone, creating a striking, continuous flow across surfaces. Ideal for wall cladding, flooring, and large-format designs that emphasize movement and depth.
vein-cut.title: Vein Cut Travertine Special Design
vein-cut.intro: Vein-cut blocks reveal linear banding for strong directionality in design.
vein-cut.intro2: Parallel bands create visual continuity across large surfaces.
vein-cut.description: Large-size special design selected at the quarry with consistent character.

TextSection.text1: Parallel bands emphasize direction and rhythm across large surfaces.
TextSection.text2: Hotel lobbies, wall cladding and long corridors where continuity is desired.

QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq1_text: They produce linear continuity ideal for long spans and feature walls.
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_header: Are there direction rules for fabrication?
QuestionsItems.aboutpage_s4_faq2_text: Keep band orientation consistent across adjacent pieces for best results.
